description: The vCenter username. You must specify the username along with the domain name. For example, user = `Administrator@vsphere.local`.
name: vcenter-username

description: Insecure flag determines if connection to VC uses a self-signed certificate or a secure connection for login.
name: insecure-flag

description: List all data center paths where host VMs are present, separated by commas. Provide the name of the data center when it is located at the root. When it is placed in the folder, you need to specify the path as folder/data-center-name
name: datacenters

description: The SSL thumbprint to be used to establish a secure connection to VC.
name: thumbprint
